AboutUs.des1: Ashyo - market-priced home appliances and electronics store. For over 2 years, weâ€™ve offered customers a wide range of guaranteed and high-quality products.
AboutUs.des2: Ashyo was established in 2022 in Tashkent. Currently, 26 stores operate in the capital and regions.
AboutUs.des3: You can purchase products in any convenient way: in-store or online. Online installment plans are available. A passport is required to register.
AboutUs.des4: For legal entities, payments can be made via bank transfer without additional charges.
